items.name: Grilled Salmon Caesar
items.description: Grilled Atlantic salmon, crisp romaine fillets, Parmesan cheese, house-made croutons and anchovy-free Caesar dressing.

items.name: Shrimp Rémoulade
items.description: A full dozen plump broiled shrimp atop Arcadian mixed greens, with diced hard-boiled eggs, sweet grape tomatoes and made-from-scratch remoulade dressing.

items.name: Pepperjack Crawfish
items.description: Tender crawfish tails simmered in a velvety Pepperjack Cheese soup with Cajun seasoning, green bell peppers, onions and a splash of Tabasco.

items.name: Spinach & Feta
items.description: A creamy mix of Feta cheese, spinach, potatoes, onion and sour cream.  Garnished with fresh basil.

items.name: Choice Roast Beef
items.description: Medium-rare thinly sliced roast beef topped with provolone cheese, romaine lettuce, tomato, mayo and spicy Creole mustard. Served on Newk’s famous French Parisian bread.

items.name: Bistro Steak Club
items.description: A quarter pound of tenderloin steak topped with bacon, Ammerlander Swiss cheese, romaine, tomato, mayo and dijon.  Served on toasted French Parisian bread.
